payload.content: Long-horizon agents are functionally AGI, and 2026 will be their year.

name: Long-horizon agents are functionally AGI, and 2026 will be their year.
content: Long-horizon agents are functionally AGI, and 2026 will be their year.

payload.content: AGI is defined functionally as the ability to figure things out, rather than a technical definition.

name: AGI is defined functionally as the ability to figure things out, rather than a t
content: AGI is defined functionally as the ability to figure things out, rather than a technical definition.

payload.content: An AI that can figure things out requires baseline knowledge (pre-training), the ability to reason over that knowledge (inference-time compute), and the ability to iterate its way to the answer (long-horizon agents).

name: An AI that can figure things out requires baseline knowledge (pre-training), the
content: An AI that can figure things out requires baseline knowledge (pre-training), the ability to reason over that knowledge (inference-time compute), and the ability to iterate its way to the answer (long-horizon agents).

payload.content: The original ChatGPT moment in 2022 was fueled by knowledge/pre-training. Reasoning/inference-time compute came with the release of o1 in late 2024. Iteration/long-horizon agents crossed a capability threshold in recent weeks with Claude Code and other coding agents.

name: The original ChatGPT moment in 2022 was fueled by knowledge/pre-training. Reason
content: The original ChatGPT moment in 2022 was fueled by knowledge/pre-training. Reasoning/inference-time compute came with the release of o1 in late 2024. Iteration/long-horizon agents crossed a capability threshold in recent weeks with Claude Code and other coding agents.

payload.content: Generally intelligent agents can work autonomously for hours, making and fixing mistakes, and figuring out what to do next without explicit instructions.

name: Generally intelligent agents can work autonomously for hours, making and fixing
content: Generally intelligent agents can work autonomously for hours, making and fixing mistakes, and figuring out what to do next without explicit instructions.

payload.content: The process of an agent navigating ambiguity to accomplish a goal, forming hypotheses, testing them, hitting dead ends, and pivoting, is analogous to how a great human recruiter operates, but done tirelessly and without explicit instruction.

name: The process of an agent navigating ambiguity to accomplish a goal, forming hypot
content: The process of an agent navigating ambiguity to accomplish a goal, forming hypotheses, testing them, hitting dead ends, and pivoting, is analogous to how a great human recruiter operates, but done tirelessly and without explicit instruction.

payload.content: Agents still fail by hallucinating, losing context, and pursuing incorrect paths, but their trajectory shows unmistakable progress and failures are increasingly fixable.

name: Agents still fail by hallucinating, losing context, and pursuing incorrect paths
content: Agents still fail by hallucinating, losing context, and pursuing incorrect paths, but their trajectory shows unmistakable progress and failures are increasingly fixable.

payload.content: Long-horizon agents advance the reasoning model paradigm by enabling models to take actions and iterate over time.

name: Long-horizon agents advance the reasoning model paradigm by enabling models to t
content: Long-horizon agents advance the reasoning model paradigm by enabling models to take actions and iterate over time.

payload.content: Two technical approaches for coaxing models to think for longer are reinforcement learning (teaching models intrinsically to maintain focus) and agent harnesses (designing scaffolding around model limitations like memory hand-offs).

name: Two technical approaches for coaxing models to think for longer are reinforcemen
content: Two technical approaches for coaxing models to think for longer are reinforcement learning (teaching models intrinsically to maintain focus) and agent harnesses (designing scaffolding around model limitations like memory hand-offs).

payload.content: The AI applications of 2023 and 2024 were primarily "talkers" or sophisticated conversationalists with limited impact.

name: The AI applications of 2023 and 2024 were primarily "talkers" or sophisticated c
content: The AI applications of 2023 and 2024 were primarily "talkers" or sophisticated conversationalists with limited impact.

payload.content: Scaling reinforcement learning is the domain of research labs, while designing agent harnesses is the domain of the application layer, with products like Manus, Claude Code, and Factory's Droids known for their engineered harnesses.

name: Scaling reinforcement learning is the domain of research labs, while designing a
content: Scaling reinforcement learning is the domain of research labs, while designing agent harnesses is the domain of the application layer, with products like Manus, Claude Code, and Factory's Droids known for their engineered harnesses.

payload.content: AI applications in 2026 and 2027 will be "doers" that feel like colleagues, leading to all-day, every-day usage with multiple instances running in parallel.

name: AI applications in 2026 and 2027 will be "doers" that feel like colleagues, lead
content: AI applications in 2026 and 2027 will be "doers" that feel like colleagues, leading to all-day, every-day usage with multiple instances running in parallel.

payload.content: Users of future AI applications will transition from working as individual contributors to managing teams of AI agents.

name: Users of future AI applications will transition from working as individual contr
content: Users of future AI applications will transition from working as individual contributors to managing teams of AI agents.

payload.content: The performance of long-horizon agents is on an exponential curve, doubling every ~7 months. By 2028, agents should reliably complete tasks that take human experts a full day; by 2034, a full year; and by 2037, a full century.

name: The performance of long-horizon agents is on an exponential curve, doubling ever
content: The performance of long-horizon agents is on an exponential curve, doubling every ~7 months. By 2028, agents should reliably complete tasks that take human experts a full day; by 2034, a full year; and by 2037, a full century.

payload.content: The capabilities of long-horizon agents are significantly different from a single forward pass of a model.

name: The capabilities of long-horizon agents are significantly different from a singl
content: The capabilities of long-horizon agents are significantly different from a single forward pass of a model.

payload.content: Agents will soon be able to perform a day's worth of work reliably, and eventually a century's worth of work.

name: Agents will soon be able to perform a day's worth of work reliably, and eventual
content: Agents will soon be able to perform a day's worth of work reliably, and eventually a century's worth of work.

payload.content: The ambitious version of a roadmap becomes realistic with the advent of long-horizon agents.

name: The ambitious version of a roadmap becomes realistic with the advent of long-hor
content: The ambitious version of a roadmap becomes realistic with the advent of long-horizon agents.
